ProdDesc: Available in 12″, 14″ and 16″ sizes

Made with Ricotta & Mozzarella Cheese and your choice of pizza toppings. (Limit 5 toppings for proper bake) Includes sauce for dipping on the side.
A sampling of our most popular toppings. Sausage, pepperoni, onions, green peppers, and fresh mushrooms. Available in hand-tossed round, square pan or thin crust.
For the meat lover. Enjoy the best meats on this pizza; sausage, pepperoni, ham and beef. Available in hand-tossed round, square pan or thin crust.
For the veggie lover! Fresh mushrooms, onions, green peppers and black olives. Available in hand-tossed round, square pan or thin crust.
All of our most popular toppings, including pepperoni, sausage, ham, ground beef, onions, mushrooms, green peppers, green and black olives. Available in hand-tossed round, square pan or thin crust.

For something lighter, give this combination a try! Extra virgin olive oil, mozzarella & feta cheese, chicken breast, red onions, tomatoes, black & green olives and garlic. Available in hand-tossed round, square pan or thin crust.
Direct from the Southwest! Lindy’s green chile, mozzarella & cheddar cheese, red onion, tomatoes, black olives, and chicken breast. Available in hand-tossed round, square pan or thin crust.
Get your taste buds warmed up for this pizza! Chicken breast, red onions, bacon and Sweet Baby Ray’s® bbq sauce. Available in hand-tossed round, square pan or thin crust.

Our new Greek salads are made from the freshest ingredients. Starting with a blend of crispy iceberg and romaine lettuce, red onions, tomatoes, beets and kalamata olives. Topped with pepperoncini and feta cheese. Add grilled chicken for an additional fee.Recommended Dressing: Greek

Our new Michigan Cherry salads are made from the freshest ingredients available. Starting with fresh spinach, red onions, dried cherries, walnuts, bacon and Gorgonzola cheese.Recommended Dressing: Balsamic

Our Antipasto salads are made from the freshest ingredients available. Starting with a blend of crispy iceberg and romaine lettuce, fresh cut onions, tomatoes, peppers, pepperoni, ham and mozzarella cheese. Add grilled chicken for an additional fee.Recommended Dressing: Italian

Our new Southwest salads are made from the freshest ingredients. Starting with a blend of crispy iceberg and romaine lettuce, red onions and tomatoes. Topped with black beans, cheddar cheese and crispy tortilla strips. Add grilled chicken for an additional fee.Recommended Dressing: Spicy Ranch

Our Chicken Caesar salads are made from the freshest ingredients. Starting with crispy 100% romaine lettuce, crunchy croutons and shredded parmesan cheese. Topped with warm grilled chicken breast strips, accompanied with our gourmet Caesar dressing or dressing of your choice.

Our Garden salads are made from the freshest ingredients. Starting with a blend of crispy iceberg and romaine lettuce, red onions, green peppers, and tomatoes. Topped with black olives and mozzarella cheese Add grilled chicken for an additional fee.Recommended Dressing: Ranch

Our Mediterranean salads are made from the freshest ingredients. Starting with a blend of crispy iceberg and romaine lettuce, red onions and tomatoes. Followed with black & green olives and banana peppers. Add grilled chicken for an additional fee.Recommended Dressing: Balsamic
Choose from Original Hand-Tossed or Deep Dish! Garlic breadsticks topped with mozzarella cheese. Your dipping sauce options are: Marinara, Ranch or Spicy Ranch.

Hot & Spicy or BBQ Boneless Chicken Wings with your choice of Ranch, Spicy Ranch or Blue Cheese dressing on the side.
Breadsticks made with the perfect blend of cinnamon and sugar, with creamy icing drizzled on top!
